resources.string:
How to make Cafe Late:
 1-Heat milk in a saucepan set over medium-low heat.
 Whisk briskly with a wire whisk to create foam.
 2-Brew espresso and pour into four cups.
Pour in milk, holding back the foam with a spoon. Spoon foam over the top

1-BEAT eggs, milk, salt and pepper in medium bowl until blended.\n 2-HEAT butter in large nonstick skillet over medium heat until hot. POUR in egg mixture. As eggs begin to set, gently PULL the eggs across the pan with a spatula, forming large soft curds.\n 3-CONTINUE cooking—pulling, lifting and folding eggs—until thickened and no visible liquid egg remains. Do not stir constantly. REMOVE from heat. SERVE immediately.

1-Chop lettuce into small, bite sized pieces. Transfer to a colander or salad spinner, rinse and dry.
2-Rinse carrots, cucumber, green onion and cherry tomatoes. Pat dry.
3-Cut carrots and cucumber into thin half moons and chop green onion.
4-Dice red onion into very small pieces and halve tomatoes.
5-Place lettuce, vegetables and tomatoes in a large bowl.
6-Measure dressing ingredients into a small bowl or glass jar and whisk well.then apply your favorite dressing.
